name: ISPAGHULA HUSK
cautions:
Cautions adequate fluid intake should be maintained to avoid
intestinal obstruction—it may be necessary to supervise elderly or
debilitated patients or those with intestinal narrowing or decreased
motility
side-effects:
Side-effects flatulence, abdominal distension, gastro-intestinal
obstruction or impaction; hypersensitivity reported
doses:
Preparations that swell in contact
with liquid should always be carefully swallowed with water and should
not be taken immediately before going to bed

1 sachet in water 1–3 times daily, preferably after meals; child (but see section
1.6) 6–12 years see BNF for Children
